title: Widow In The Freezer
description:
Summary: The body of a wealthy widow was found in her deep freezer in the heart of East Texas oil country...and the events that unfolded were so wild that they inspired a Hollywood movie starring comedian Jack Black. Was Marjorie Nugent a sweet little old lady - or the meanest woman in town? And was her manservant Bernie a guy with a heart of gold in an abusive relationship, or a con artist and sweetheart scammer?
